job.name: Wait for any
job.description: Execute processing tasks, and wait for one task from the taskNames list to finish before continuing.

script.code:
schedulerapi.connect()
def job_id = variables["PA_JOB_ID"] def task_names_list = variables["taskNames"].split(",") as List def time_out_in_sec = 30
println "(waiting for a task in " + task_names_list + " to finish)" schedulerapi.waitForAnyTask(job_id, task_names_list, time_out_in_sec * 1000)
variables["isFinished"] = "true"
